parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Clear all items from a listbox / combobox.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[lbClear]] idc

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - IDC of the target listbox / combobox in the topmost [[Arma: GUI Configuration|Dialog]].

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[lbClear]] control

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbClear]] 101;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[lbClear]] _ctrl;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]] [[lbColor]] [[lbCurSel]] [[lbData]] [[lbDelete]] [[lbIsSelected]] [[lbPicture]] [[lbSelection]] [[lbSetColor]] [[lbSetCurSel]] [[lbSetData]] [[lbSetPicture]] [[lbSetSelected]] [[lbSetTooltip]] [[lbSetValue]] [[lbSize]] [[lbSort]] [[lbSortByValue]] [[lbText]] [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">More information on the [[CT_LISTBOX]] command family can be found [[CT_LISTBOX#Scripting_Example|here]].
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
